Class AdapterPackage.AdapterAPI1toAPI2

java.lang.Object
AdapterPackage.AdapterAPI1toAPI2
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdapterPackage.API2
public class AdapterPackage.AdapterAPI1toAPI2 extends Object implements AdapterPackage.API2
The AdapterPackage.AdapterAPI1toAPI2 class adapts an AdapterPackage.API1 instance to behave as an AdapterPackage.API2 instance, allowing rectangles to be drawn using AdapterPackage.API1 coordinates but accessed via AdapterPackage.API2.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AdapterPackage.AdapterAPI1toAPI2(AdapterPackage.API1 api1)
    Constructs an adapter for an AdapterPackage.API1 instance to be used as AdapterPackage.API2.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    drawAPI2(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
    Converts corner points to width and height and draws the rectangle using AdapterPackage.API1.

      public void drawAPI2(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Converts corner points to width and height and draws the rectangle using AdapterPackage.API1.
      Specified by:
      drawAPI2 in interface AdapterPackage.API2
      Parameters:
      x1 - the x-coordinate of the first corner point
      y1 - the y-coordinate of the first corner point
      x2 - the x-coordinate of the second corner point
      y2 - the y-coordinate of the second corner point
